# Introducing our new NVMe KVM VPS Line

### RAID-10 pure NVMe VPS!

*The moment you've been waiting for is here! (or at least the moment I've been waiting for)*

We're excited to introduce, our brand new NVMe line of Virtual Private Servers!

Take advantage of this sale while it lasts! (Coupon is good through Sunday, May 3)

**Promo Code: (40% [recurring] off ANY [NVMe VPS](https://clik.rip/NVMeVPS))**

```
NVMEVPSLAUNCH
```

> **[NVMe KVM Nano](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=292)** | 8 GB NVMe | 512 MB DDR4 | 1 vCPU | ~~$6/mo~~ $3.60/mo

> **[NVMe KVM Micro](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=293)** | 16 GB NVMe | 1 GB DDR4 | 1 vCPU | ~~$10/mo~~ $6/mo

**All NVMe servers include:**

* 1 TB Premium Bandwidth
* 1 Gbps+ Port Speed
* 1 IPv4 Address
* /64 IPv6 Subnet

***Currently we only have the NVMe line available in our Phoenix data center location***
